name: Rise of the Butterknife
description:
"Once upon a time, there was a small, slippery butter knife..."

In this HD2D sidescroller a little butter knife pursues his big dream of becoming a pocket knife. With the help of butter he has to fight his way through the whole kitchen and some enemies.

This game was created in one week and was part of the Game Dev Week Trier 2021.1.

Features

- Slide on butter!
- Fight against kitchen tools!
- Explore the kitchen!
